mean_en: machine in which rotating records cause a stylus to vibrate and the vibrations are amplified acoustically or electronically
sentence: The music player has improved much over the years, from the phonograph to the iPod.
sentence_trans: 这些年，从留声机到ipod，音乐播放器改进了很多。
word_etyma: phono声音 ＋ graph写 → 写下声音 → phonograph留声机
